price: I tako, eto, Mi ga u vidu jasnih ajeta objavljujemo, a Allah će onom kome hoće na Pravi put ukazati.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِۭ بَيِّنَٰتٖ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَهۡدِي مَن يُرِيدُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika anzalnāhu āyātin bayyinātin wa-anna al-laha yahdī man yurīdu
